item.title: CVE-2024-32455|2024-04-16T18:57:23.066Z -- Very Good Plugins -- Fatal Error Notify
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Very Good Plugins Fatal Error Notify.This issue affects Fatal Error Notify: from n/a through 1.5.2.
